item.title: (Book Review) Risk Management Books
item.description: Predictive Data Minining Model Intro Knowledge discovery involves finding interesting patterns from data stored in large databases through use of computer analysis. Interesting implies non-trivial, implicit, previously unknown, easily understood, useful and actionable knowledge. Information is defined as the pattersn, correlations, rules, or relationships in data providing knowledge useful in decision making. Descriptive analytics reports of what has happened. Statistics are big part of that. Predictive analytics
